customer_support_faq.question: How do I track my order?
customer_support_faq.answer: You can track your order by going to the 'My Orders' section on the app or website. Click on the order you want to track to see the current status.

customer_support_faq.question: How can I return a product?
customer_support_faq.answer: To return a product, go to the 'My Orders' section, select the product, and click on 'Return'. Follow the instructions to initiate the return.

customer_support_faq.question: What is the return policy?
customer_support_faq.answer: You can return most items within 30 days of delivery. Some items have specific return policies, which you can find in the product details.

customer_support_faq.question: How do I cancel an order?
customer_support_faq.answer: You can cancel your order before it is shipped. Go to 'My Orders', select the order, and click on 'Cancel'.

customer_support_faq.question: How do I contact customer support?
customer_support_faq.answer: You can contact customer support by visiting the 'Help Center' on our website or app, or by calling our customer care number.

customer_support_faq.question: What payment methods are accepted?
customer_support_faq.answer: We accept various payment methods, including credit/debit cards, net banking, UPI, and Cash on Delivery (COD).

customer_support_faq.question: How do I update my address?
customer_support_faq.answer: To update your address, go to the 'Account Settings' and click on 'Manage Addresses'. You can edit or add new addresses from there.

customer_support_faq.question: What should I do if I receive a damaged product?
customer_support_faq.answer: If you receive a damaged product, initiate a return through 'My Orders' and select 'Damaged Product' as the reason. You can also contact customer support for assistance.

customer_support_faq.question: How can I apply a coupon code?
customer_support_faq.answer: You can apply a coupon code at checkout. Enter the code in the 'Apply Coupon' field and click 'Apply' to avail the discount.

customer_support_faq.question: How do I check my refund status?
customer_support_faq.answer: To check your refund status, go to 'My Orders' and click on the order that you returned. The refund status will be shown there.

customer_support_faq.question: What is the estimated delivery time?
customer_support_faq.answer: The estimated delivery time varies based on your location and the product. You can check the expected delivery date on the product page and in 'My Orders'.

customer_support_faq.question: Can I change my delivery address after placing an order?
customer_support_faq.answer: You can change your delivery address before the order is shipped by going to 'My Orders' and selecting 'Change Address'.

customer_support_faq.question: How do I know if my payment was successful?
customer_support_faq.answer: After making a payment, you will receive a confirmation message and an email. You can also check your order status in 'My Orders'.

customer_support_faq.question: How do I subscribe to notifications and offers?
customer_support_faq.answer: To subscribe to notifications and offers, go to 'Account Settings' and enable notifications under 'Preferences'.

customer_support_faq.question: What are the delivery charges?
customer_support_faq.answer: Delivery charges may vary depending on your location and order value. You can check the delivery charges during checkout.
